scripts.env:check: node -e "console.log('Environment Variables:'); Object.keys(process.env).filter(k => k.startsWith('NEXT_PUBLIC_') || ['INTERVIEWS_JWT', 'OPENROUTER_API_KEY'].includes(k)).forEach(k => console.log(k + ':', process.env[k] ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Missing'))"
scripts.env:validate: node -e "const missing = ['NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL', 'INTERVIEWS_JWT', 'OPENROUTER_API_KEY'].filter(k => !process.env[k]); if (missing.length) { console.error('❌ Missing required environment variables:', missing); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ All required environment variables are set'); }"
